name: Occurrence Code and Date
description:
The code and associated date defining a significant event relating to a bill that may affect payer processing.

Example: |23&Benefits Exhausted&NUBC^19920108|

fields.name: Occurrence Code
fields.description: The NUBC code for the event or occurrence relating to a bill that may affect payer processing.

fields.name: Occurrence Date
fields.description: The date the event, relating to a bill that may affect payer processing, occurred.
